params._buyAmount: The min amount of asset to buy
params._id: The ID of the position to borrow more from
params._sellAmount: The amount of collateral to sell

params._id: The ID of the position to repay borrowed asset to
The ID of the position to close

params._position: The parameters of the new position

returns.positionId: The ID of the new position

params._amount: The amount of collateral to deposit.
params._id: The ID of the position to deposit collateral into.

returns._0: position the position when last modified
returns.currentLeverage: the current profit of the position

params._amount: The amount of collateral to withdraw
params._id: The ID of the position to withdraw collateral from

buy(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Borrow more assets to a position, keeps the leverage.

buyback(uint256,uint256).notice: Repay borrowed asset in a position

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit collateral into a leveraged position.

getPosition(uint256).notice: returns the info of a position for `_id`

isClosable(uint256[]).notice: returns the closable status for positions

isLiquidatable(uint256[]).notice: Get the liquidatable status of a lever positions

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw collateral from a leveraged position
